name: Experiment length
definition: Total duration of recording across multiple sessions

name: Experiment number of at single neuron resolution
definition: Number of individual neurons that can be recorded at single neuron resolution

name: Experiment sampling rate
definition: Average frequency at wich neurons are sampled

name: Experiment costs
definition: total costs per experiment, including partial hardware, personnel and misc experimental costs; excluding storage costs

name: Experiment data volume
definition: Uncompressed raw data generated by experiment

name: Percentage of consecutive connectomic scans?
definition: What percent of the total brain volume that was recorded should also be scanned for aligned structural and functional datasets?

name: Number of experiments / brain area coverage
definition: Assuming experiments are scanning complementary brain areas, how often does the sum of all experiments cover we the selected brain volume? This could for instance account for different brain states (sleeping, moving, etc.)

name: Number of samples / experiment
definition: How many samples do we get per experiment

name: Number of samples / brain area
definition: On average, How many samples do we get of one brain volume in total
